name: zero g rescue squad
description:
HEADLINE NEWS:  A series of luxury cruise ships have experienced "terminal failure" near a black hole. Activate the Rescue Squad to save as many as you can!

Zero G Rescue Squad was created for the Nerdery Game Jam 2017. It was designed and built in 48 hours by Paul Trandem.

It has no sound because space is silent. 

Not because Paul ran out of time.
